subject: Drunken and Reckless Driving
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Three members of Boston College’s national championship team face alcohol charges after the sport utility vehicle they were in was hit by a trolley in Boston while making a U-turn across the tracks.
snippet: Three members of Boston College’s national championship team face alcohol charges after the sport utility vehicle they were in was hit by a trolley in Boston while making a U-turn across the tracks.
